title: Bloodthirster Viability
body: Since the nerf, how viable is the bloodthirster?

replies.body: My understanding is that The Bloodthirster {{item:3072}}  is a must-have for almost any ADC as their life-steal item. I usually grab this when there are no true tanks on the other team and rush it. Otherwise grab Blade of the Ruined King {{item:3153}} first to hit the tanks harder while grabbing a sweet active  as well.
there are 2 builds, {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} or {{item:3072}} {{item:3046}}, both are really good.
100% go to item for draven and other adcs that don't want bork
